title: Bug 6009 - New class wizard doesn't get context right for nested classes
OB: When using the new class wizard for nested classes, the context is not set correctly.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the new class wizard. 
2. Select the option for creating a nested class. 
3. Follow the wizard and complete the creation process. 
4. Check the context of the newly created nested class.
